description: This file defines a React context provider component for managing a Kanban board, including state for columns and cards, CRUD operations, real-time updates via subscriptions, and custom hooks for consuming the context.

methods.name: useKanban()
methods.description: Custom React hook to access the Kanban context.

methods.name: KanbanProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides Kanban board state and operations to its children via context.

methods.name: fetchAll
methods.description: Fetches all columns and cards data from the database and updates state.

methods.name: addColumn
methods.description: Adds a new column with a given title.

methods.name: updateColumn
methods.description: Updates an existing column identified by id with provided updates.

methods.name: reorderColumns
methods.description: Reorders columns based on an ordered list of id-position objects.

methods.name: addCard
methods.description: Adds a new card to a specified column with provided fields.

methods.name: updateCard
methods.description: Updates a card identified by id with new data.

methods.name: deleteCard
methods.description: Deletes a card by id and updates local state optimistically.

methods.name: reorderCardsInColumn
methods.description: Reorders cards within a specific column.

methods.name: bulkInsertCards
methods.description: Inserts multiple cards into a column in bulk, assigning sequential positions.
